channel.title: [HELP]NPCdrop.cfg error[DELTA]
channel.description:
Now I was just adding some drop rates to my newly added custom npc and got a perfect thing on compiling yet the server gets a error on its NPCdrop.cfg
Heres the picture of what I added and with the error [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/vndmqp.png[/img]
Thanks for your help
Updated error after retabing [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/35jfpfk.png[/img]

item.title: [HELP]NPCdrop.cfg error[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

lostmyphat:

Change the 45 to 100

didn’t work

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]NPCdrop.cfg error[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:9, topic:455175”]You can change that limit in your npchandler,
its something like "public static int[] maxdrops = new int[15];
if I remember it right, then you can raise the value (15) to be able to add more drops[/quote]

Now i cound not find[15] yet i found these two codes that look similar and have no clue what they mean

[code] public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45]; // room for 15 drops per npc

public NPCDrops NpcDrops[] = new NPCDrops[maxNPCDrops];[/code]

public class NPCHandler { public static boolean IsDropping = false; public static int maxNPCs = 10000; public static int maxListedNPCs = 10000; // npc list every npc listed no // duplicates -bakatool public static int maxNPCDrops = 10000; public static int maxNPCSpawns = 10000; // spawns could be same npc multiple

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]NPCdrop.cfg error[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

You can change that limit in your npchandler,
its something like "public static int[] maxdrops = new int[15];
if I remember it right, then you can raise the value (15) to be able to add more drops

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]NPCdrop.cfg error[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

Wow i didnt know there was a limit i will take a note of that for the future!

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]NPCdrop.cfg error[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

You have too many drops for the corporal beast. Delta, by default, only handles 15 drops per NPC.

Read full topic
